data:
  type: array
  items:
    type: object
    properties:
      blockNumber:
        type: number
        format: blknum_t
        example: 10021
        description: "the number of the block"
      timestamp:
        type: number
        format: timestamp_t
        example: 1438335038
        description: "the unix timestamp of the block"
      date:
        description: "Human readable version of timestamp"
        example: "2015-07-30 15:34:53 UTC"
        type: string
